verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050> Sing<WH7891> to the LORD<WH3068> a new<WH2319> song,<WH7892> and his praise<WH8416> in the congregation<WH6951> of saints.<WH2623>
Let Israel<WH3478> rejoice<WH8055> in him that made<WH6213> him: let the children<WH1121> of Zion<WH6726> be joyful<WH1523> in their King.<WH4428>
Let them praise<WH1984> his name<WH8034> in the dance:<WH4234> let them sing<WH2167> praises to him with the tambourine<WH8596> and harp.<WH3658>
For the LORD<WH3068> takes pleasure<WH7521> in his people:<WH5971> he will beautify<WH6286> the meek<WH6035> with salvation.<WH3444>
Let the saints<WH2623> be joyful<WH5937> in glory:<WH3519> let them sing<WH7442> aloud<WH7442> on their beds.<WH4904>
Let the high<WH7319> praises of God<WH410> be in their mouth,<WH1627> and a two-edged<WH6374> sword<WH2719> in their hand;<WH3027>
To execute<WH6213> vengeance<WH5360> on the heathen,<WH1471> and punishments<WH5771> on the people;<WH3816>
To bind<WH631> their kings<WH4428> with chains,<WH2131> and their nobles<WH3513> with fetters<WH3525> of iron;<WH1270>
To execute<WH6213> on them the judgment<WH4941> written:<WH3789> this<WH1931> honor<WH1926> have all<WH3605> his saints.<WH2623> Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050>
